PrecisApproval of the variation made by the NATIONAL ENERGY BOARD to a Licence (GL-283) held by ANDROSCOGGIN ENERGY LLC, which provides for a decrease in the overall amount of natural gas that may be exported pursuant thereto, as set forth in N.E.B. Order AO-1-GL-283.
